{{also|bild}} ==Central Franconian== ===Alternative forms=== * {{alter|gmw-cfr|Beld||less common}} ===Etymology=== From {{inh|gmw-cfr|goh|bilidi}}. The vocalism ''-i-'' is regular due to the originally open syllable.
